content.full_text:
Edward D. Baker to Abraham Lincoln, 18 May 18501 Judge YoungandGeneral Shieldshave signed a note with me for $500. This is an order to you to pay that amount out

of My Moffett notes and mortgage at the request of either of them and it is intended

as a specific lien on them for that amount
paragraphs: Edward D. Baker to Abraham Lincoln, 18 May 18501 Judge YoungandGeneral Shieldshave signed a note with me for $500. This is an order to you to pay that amount out
of My Moffett notes and mortgage at the request of either of them and it is intended
as a specific lien on them for that amount

footnotes.text: 1Edward D. Baker wrote and signed this letter.

               as a specific lien  on them for that amount
